resources.string: Behind That Locked Door: Beatles Rarities!

In a vault deep inside Abbey Road in London - pro For more information, see the Beatles Time Capsule at www.rockument.com. 

 This volume starts with the first new Beatles song, "Free as a Bird" (based on a John Lenn). 

 Highlights includes 

 Cry for a Shadow - Many a Beatle fanatic started down the bootleg road,like 

 My Bonnie and Ain't she Sweet - At the same session, the Beatles 

 Searching - A jerry Leiber - Mike Stoller comedy song that was a hit for the year 

 Love Me Do - An early version of the song, played a bit slower and with more pitch 

 She Loves You - Till There was You - Twist and Shout - Live at the princess's house 

 Leave My Kitten Alone - One of the lost Beatle songs recorded during the "Beatles year" 

 One After 909 - A song recorded for the Let It Be album was actually launched
